author: dlr
msg: SWIG/Python: Add mapping for "range list" APIs.
(svn_swig_py_rangelist_to_list): Add new function to convert an
apr_array_header_t * (of svn_merge_range_t *) to a Python list.
(RANGELIST): Add new typemap which leverages svn_swig_py_rangelist_to_list().

author: lgo
msg: Add --bin option to win-tests.py to enable running the tests with an already
installed version of Subversion. This allows for better regression testing.
(global, usage, run_tests): add --bin option, if set use it to set the

author: lgo
msg: Fix an issue where updating an item that's being copied, updates the
entry's revision to HEAD.  This effectively overwrites the copy-from
revision whereby the wrong revision of the file is copied.
(svn_wc__tweak_entry): don't overwrite the entry's revision with the
new revision when the item was copied.
